description: A closure device placed in the patent foramen ovale (PFO) to prevent the passage of blood between the atria.

attributes.name: presence_of_device
attributes.description: Indicates whether a PFO closure device is present or absent.

values.name: Present
values.description: A PFO closure device is present.

values.name: Absent
values.description: A PFO closure device is absent.

attributes.name: device_status
attributes.description: The status of the PFO closure device.

values.name: New placement
values.description: A new PFO closure device has been placed.

values.name: Unchanged
values.description: The PFO closure device is unchanged.

values.name: Complication
values.description: There is a complication associated with the PFO closure device.

values.name: Removed
values.description: The PFO closure device has been removed.

attributes.name: device_type
attributes.description: The type of PFO closure device.

values.name: Amplatzer
values.description: The PFO closure device is of type Amplatzer.

values.name: Gore HELEX
values.description: The PFO closure device is of type Gore HELEX.

values.name: Other
values.description: The PFO closure device is of another type.

attributes.name: associated_thrombus
attributes.description: Indicates the presence or absence of an associated thrombus.
